titleStmt.title: Of holy living first a serious exhortation thereunto : secondly choice directions therein, both for every working and for every Lords-day.
titleStmt.author: Mall, Thomas, b. 1629 or 30.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Grantham ..., and are to be sold by Robert Eveleigh ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Added t.p.: A serious exhortation to holy living. By Thomas Mall.
